name: Hollow Pines
description:
Welcome to Hollow Pines, home to the world's biggest crater - that you just so happen to fall into. Explore the forest that has reclaimed the crater and solve puzzles in order to find your way back home. Made in roughly 3 days for Fall Jam 2022. We're using it as a base for a larger game, so keep an eye out for future updates!

Programmer: Filippo Cortese
Artist: Ilse-May Brink
Music from: https://www.bensound.com/
Sound Effects:
Crash - https://freesound.org/people/ReyDros/sounds/327054/
Pickup - https://freesound.org/people/FunWithSound/sounds/456965/
